inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientMdeCertificateAssessm_CL 
| extend IssuedToProperties = todynamic(issuedTo_s)
| extend IssuedByProperties = todynamic(issuedBy_s)
| mv-expand IssuedToProperties
| mv-expand IssuedByProperties
| extend IssuedToLocality = tostring(IssuedToProperties["Locality"])
| extend IssuedToOrganisation = tostring(IssuedToProperties["Organisation"])
| extend IssuedToOrganisationalUnit = tostring(IssuedToProperties["OrganisationalUnit"])
| extend IssuedToCommonName = tostring(IssuedToProperties["CommonName"])
| extend IssuedByCommonName = tostring(IssuedByProperties["CommonName"])
| extend IssuedByLocality = tostring(IssuedByProperties["Locality"])
| extend IssuedByOrganisation = tostring(IssuedByProperties["Organisation"])
| extend IssuedByOrganisationalUnit = tostring(IssuedByProperties["OrganisationalUnit"])
| extend IssuedByCountryName = tostring(IssuedByProperties["CountryName"])
| extend IssuedByStateOrProvinceName = tostring(IssuedByProperties["StateOrProvinceName"])
| extend splitted=split(path_s, '\\')
| mv-expand CertPath=splitted[1], CertPathStore=splitted[2]
| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by deviceName_s, thumbprint_s
| project-away splitted, SourceSystem, Type, IssuedToProperties, IssuedByProperties, issuedTo_s, issuedBy_s, deviceId_s, path_s, TenantId
| where expirationDate_t < ago(0d)
| where CertPathStore == "My"
| distinct deviceName_s
| summarize total = count()
","size":0,"title":"DEVICES WITH EXPIRED CERTIFICATES, PERSONAL, EXCL. MEM CERT | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/a44943a6-e853-487c-a213-e42cf625ae41/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-p"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientMdeCertificateAssessm_CL 
| extend IssuedToProperties = todynamic(issuedTo_s)
| extend IssuedByProperties = todynamic(issuedBy_s)
| mv-expand IssuedToProperties
| mv-expand IssuedByProperties
| extend IssuedToLocality = tostring(IssuedToProperties["Locality"])
| extend IssuedToOrganisation = tostring(IssuedToProperties["Organisation"])
| extend IssuedToOrganisationalUnit = tostring(IssuedToProperties["OrganisationalUnit"])
| extend IssuedToCommonName = tostring(IssuedToProperties["CommonName"])
| extend IssuedByCommonName = tostring(IssuedByProperties["CommonName"])
| extend IssuedByLocality = tostring(IssuedByProperties["Locality"])
| extend IssuedByOrganisation = tostring(IssuedByProperties["Organisation"])
| extend IssuedByOrganisationalUnit = tostring(IssuedByProperties["OrganisationalUnit"])
| extend IssuedByCountryName = tostring(IssuedByProperties["CountryName"])
| extend IssuedByStateOrProvinceName = tostring(IssuedByProperties["StateOrProvinceName"])
| extend splitted=split(path_s, '\\')
| mv-expand CertPath=splitted[1], CertPathStore=splitted[2]
| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by deviceName_s, thumbprint_s
| project-away splitted, SourceSystem, Type, IssuedToProperties, IssuedByProperties, issuedTo_s, issuedBy_s, deviceId_s, path_s, TenantId
| extend ExpireDatewithBuffer = ago(0d) + 60d
| where (expirationDate_t < ExpireDatewithBuffer) and (expirationDate_t > ago(0d))
| where CertPathStore == "My"
| where IssuedByCommonName !contains "MS-Organization-P2P-Access"
| project-reorder deviceName_s, IssuedByCommonName, IssuedToCommonName, CertPath, CertPathStore
| distinct deviceName_s
| summarize total = count()
","size":0,"title":"DEVICES WITH SOON TO EXPIRE CERTIFICATES (60 DAYS), PERSONAL, GROUPED, EXCL MEM CERT | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/a44943a6-e853-487c-a213-e42cf625ae41/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-p"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientMdeCertificateAssessm_CL 
| where expirationDate_t < ago(0d)
| extend IssuedToProperties = todynamic(issuedTo_s)
| extend IssuedByProperties = todynamic(issuedBy_s)
| mv-expand IssuedToProperties
| mv-expand IssuedByProperties
| extend IssuedToLocality = tostring(IssuedToProperties["Locality"])
| extend IssuedToOrganisation = tostring(IssuedToProperties["Organisation"])
| extend IssuedToOrganisationalUnit = tostring(IssuedToProperties["OrganisationalUnit"])
| extend IssuedToCommonName = tostring(IssuedToProperties["CommonName"])
| extend IssuedByCommonName = tostring(IssuedByProperties["CommonName"])
| extend IssuedByLocality = tostring(IssuedByProperties["Locality"])
| extend IssuedByOrganisation = tostring(IssuedByProperties["Organisation"])
| extend IssuedByOrganisationalUnit = tostring(IssuedByProperties["OrganisationalUnit"])
| extend IssuedByCountryName = tostring(IssuedByProperties["CountryName"])
| extend IssuedByStateOrProvinceName = tostring(IssuedByProperties["StateOrProvinceName"])
| extend splitted=split(path_s, '\\')
| mv-expand CertPath=splitted[1], CertPathStore=splitted[2]
| summarize TimeGenerated = arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by deviceName_s, thumbprint_s
| project-away splitted, SourceSystem, Type, IssuedToProperties, IssuedByProperties, issuedTo_s, issuedBy_s, deviceId_s, path_s, TenantId
| project-reorder deviceName_s, IssuedByCommonName, IssuedToCommonName, CertPath, CertPathStore
| where CertPathStore == "My"
| summarize total = count() by tostring(IssuedToCommonName), tostring(IssuedByCommonName), tostring(CertPath), tostring(CertPathStore), deviceName_s
| sort by total desc","size":0,"title":"EXPIRED CERTIFICATES, PERSONAL, GROUPED | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/a44943a6-e853-487c-a213-e42cf625ae41/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-p"],"visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true}}
